name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A creamy and flavorful dish made with chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then cooked in a tomato-based sauce.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic Italian dish made with pasta, bacon, eggs, and cheese.

name: Sushi Roll
description: A Japanese dish made with rice, seaweed, and various fillings, such as fish, vegetables, and eggs.

name: Burger
description: A classic American dish made with a patty of ground beef, cooked and placed between two halves of a bun, with various toppings, such as lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.

name: Pizza
description: A flatbread topped with tomato sauce and cheese, and then cooked in an oven.
